title: A booke of sundry draughtes principaly serving for glasiers: and not impertinent for plasterers, and gardiners: be sides sundry other professions. Whereunto is annexed the manner how to anniel in glas: and also the true forme of the fornace, and the secretes thereof.
author: Gedde, Walter.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed in Shoolane, at the signe of the Faulcon by Walter Dight,
